g.text: Pede para inserir a informação do produto(short description, extended description, technical description, brand,
reference, production code, internal code, price, photo,barcode)
brand,reference,production code, internal code, price, photo,barcode)
newProduct = create(cat,short description, extended description,technical description,
brand,reference,production code, internal code, price, photo and barcode)
Mostra toda a informação e pede confirmação
